mapper.select: SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=1 AND NO<=7
SELECT TITLE,IMGSRC,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=8 AND NO<=12
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=13 AND NO<=17
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE,RANKING FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=18 AND NO<=22

SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=26 AND NO<=32
SELECT TITLE,IMGSRC,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=33 AND NO<=37
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=38 AND NO<=42
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE,RANKING FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=43 AND NO<=47
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=48 AND NO<=50
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=51 AND NO<=57
SELECT TITLE,IMGSRC,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=58 AND NO<=62
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=63 AND NO<=67
SELECT NO,TITLE,IMGSRC,DETAIL,PTITLE,RANKING FROM TICKETDB WHERE NO>=68 AND NO<=72

SELECT NO, TITLE, RUNDATE, THEATER, IMGSRC, REVIEWS, GRADE, RUNTIME, PERFORMER, PRICE FROM TICKETDB WHERE IMGSRC=#{VALUE}
